Title: Stats
Description: Quick guide to your characterâ€™s key combat numbers.

Sections.Title: AC
Sections.Content: Armor Class reduces incoming physical melee damage; higher AC means hits hurt less.

Sections.Title: MR
Sections.Content: Magic Resistance lowers magic damage taken; higher MR softens spells and skills aimed at you.

Sections.Title: DC
Sections.Content: Physical Damage stat for weapons; raises the minimum and maximum damage of your melee attacks.

Sections.Title: Accuracy & Attack Speed
Sections.Content: Accuracy helps your blows land more often, while Attack Speed shortens the time between swings.

Sections.Title: SP (Nature) - MC
Sections.Content: Nature Spell Power boosts magic that scales with MC; increases both low and high ends of those spells.

Sections.Title: SP (Spirit) - SC
Sections.Content: Spirit Spell Power boosts magic that scales with SC; raises the damage range of spirit-based spells.

Sections.Title: Elemental Attack
Sections.Content: Fire, Ice, Lightning, Wind, Holy, Dark, and Phantom attack add extra elemental damage to your strikes.

Sections.Title: Elemental Resistance
Sections.Content: Matching elemental resistances reduce damage from those elements; higher values mean you endure that element better.

Sections.Title: Health & Mana
Sections.Content: Health keeps you alive; Mana fuels spells and skills. More of each means greater staying power.

Sections.Title: Comfort
Sections.Content: Comfort speeds your natural regeneration ticks, helping you recover faster over time.
